ygData.subject: Re: BUG/FEEDBACK
ygData.msgSnippet: You are right. I don t believe that you should be able to nuke thing that are in a building if you are not in the building yourself or nuke things outside a
ygData.messageBody:
You are right. I don't believe that you should be able to nuke thing that
are in a building if you are not in the building yourself or nuke things
outside a building if you are in it. What I am saying is that monsters
should not beable to walk through walls to get at you or to get away. I
think that they should have the same limitations as us. If we get them in
stuck (say two big rocks) between objects and can take them on one at a time
then that is using our heads. I don't think that the NPC should be able to
pass through them just because they CAN.



-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Trubiani <u1607755@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 01, 1999 4:39 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: BUG/FEEDBACK


>From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>
>Well, I disagree. Being able to stand inside a building in safety while
>nuking a monster that cannot hit you is not using your head but cheating.
>Perhaps this isn't what you were referring to in your message, but this
>would seem to be want Verrant is protecting against, and now that I think
>about it, I'd say it's wise. Other wise people could go out and solo just
>about anything without ever getting hit. They'd be levelling 2-3 times a
>day, and the game would be easy.
>
>Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
